trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL that references an image.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面，以選取參考影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL property that references an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor> 是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>，提供一個對話方塊以選取參照映像的 URL 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.
trans-unit.target: 取得要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

trans-unit.source: The caption to display on the selection dialog window.
trans-unit.target: 要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器的檔名篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: This string is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此字串用來判斷出現在對話方塊檔案清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The filter string that can be used to filter the file list of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件字串，可用來篩選對話方塊的檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor.Filter%2A> property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for common image file extensions (*.gif, *.jpg, *.jpeg, *.bmp, *.wmf, *.png), and one for all files (\*.\*).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ImageUrlEditor.Filter%2A>屬性指定兩個篩選選項的篩選字串： 一個用於常見映像檔案的延伸模組 （*.gif，*.jpg、 *.jpeg、 *.bmp，*.wmf，*.png），另一個用於所有檔案 (\*。\*)。

trans-unit.source: A filter string contains one or more filter options.
trans-unit.target: 篩選字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。

trans-unit.source: Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern.
trans-unit.target: 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。

trans-unit.source: The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar.
trans-unit.target: 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
trans-unit.target: 包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。

trans-unit.source: You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定篩選選項中的數種篩選模式以分號區隔篩選模式。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns: "`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個篩選選項會指定三個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。
